scenes.visual_description: Vibrant, digital comic book art. A lone figure stands silhouetted against a blinding white light, surrounded by a thick, irregular black border. The figure reaches a hand towards the light.
Close-up on the figure's hand. The black border encroaches, tendrils creeping in from the edges, swirling like ink in water.
The black border consumes the figure completely, leaving only a vibrant, swirling vortex of black against the white light.
